metadata.name: Illumination
metadata.description:
“Illumination” is an oil painting featuring a vibrant and colorful floating human-like figure. The painting is composed of a glowing yellow light surrounding the faceless body, heavy textures due to the pallet used to create the image, and rich, bright pink colors. “Illumination” is inspired by the concept of enlightenment and evolution during our journey through life. The warm yet vibrant tones of the painting create a peaceful, calming atmosphere, perfect for any home or office.

Painting Size: 2m x 1.35m
